description.raw:
This is marked WIP because it needs new releases of SDF9 and ign-common3. We can't make those until after the Urban Circuit. 

This is a port of [Gazebo classic's buoyancy plugin](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/src/default/plugins/BuoyancyPlugin.hh). 

The behavior of this Buoyancy plugin matches that of Gazebo classic. The primary difference is that this new plugin can calculate the volume of meshes. The old plugin offered some more customization via plugin SDF elements. I left those out for now since I didn't have a good use case.

I could use some eyes on the math in `Buoyancy.cc`.

This is marked WIP because it needs new releases of SDF9 and ign-common3. We can't make those until after the Urban Circuit.

This is a port of Gazebo classic's buoyancy plugin.

The behavior of this Buoyancy plugin matches that of Gazebo classic. The primary difference is that this new plugin can calculate the volume of meshes. The old plugin offered some more customization via plugin SDF elements. I left those out for now since I didn't have a good use case.
